name: Peaceful space inside the heart of Hanoi
description:
Hanoi - Vietnam's capital is modernizing day by day. Coming to Hanoi, tourists will be impressed by Old Quarter, busy streets and markets, and also the flooding traffic here. 
Taking this tour, you willhave a chance to stay away fromthe city's rushness and experience a new, beautiful and peaceful part of real Hanoi, a part that you have never seen before. It will be a real good time for you to discover the real Hanoians daily live as well as the knowledge about culture and history. 
Nothing “touristy” about it, are you ready for a whole new experience?
